title: Understanding Debriefing
text: Debriefing is a process often used in various fields, including healthcare, to reflect on an event and discuss what happened.

title: Purpose of Debriefing
text: The main goal of debriefing is to enhance learning and improve future responses by discussing the event in detail.

hintAnswer: focused, purposeful discussion employed to enhance education or make improvements
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes debriefing?
choices: a medical abbreviation for the Latin pro re nata, meaning, “as it is needed.”
soft restraints, chemical restraints, medical restraints, behavioral restraints, and environmental restraints
alternative to assistance of security personnel for mental health clients; consists of clinicians, social workers, and counselors
focused, purposeful discussion employed to enhance education or make improvements
